jobDescription: RESPONSIBILITIES:Kforce's client is one of the fastest growing regional CPA firms in the nation. They are seeking qualified Audit Seniors with real estate experience in their NYC office. The ideal candidate will participate on various engagements for diverse real estate entities, reporting to managers and supervising staff. Candidates that are bright, dedicated and ambitious are encouraged to apply today. This position has very competitive compensation and benefits.REQUIREMENTS: Degree in Accounting CPA completed or in progress 3+ years of recent related public accounting audit experience Real estate industry exposure is a must Kforce is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, protected veteran status, or disability status.
